Pepsi Throwback & Mountain Dew Throwback = awesomeness
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2009 Topics (Year of the Laboratory): Pepsi Throwback & Mountain Dew Throwback = awesomeness
By Lisa Shock on Thursday, April 30, 2009 - 10:42 pm:

Try them now, before they leave us. It's 8 weeks only.

By Thorr on Friday, May 1, 2009 - 05:32 am:

MD with real sugar is HEAVEN.

By Lisa Shock on Friday, May 1, 2009 - 10:42 am:

I agree. Super-delicious. Tell a friend.

By WWDMMax on Friday, May 1, 2009 - 12:51 pm:

I love Mountain Dew, period, but this sounds very promising. Is it commonplace or do only certain places carry it?

By Lisa Shock on Friday, May 1, 2009 - 05:22 pm:

I think it's a ten city test. I have seen it at Albertson's and Circle K. The Wednesday circulars showed KMart as having ti on sale.

Some people online say they got it at Target, but the two I visited did not have it, yet.

By WWDMMax on Saturday, May 2, 2009 - 11:36 am:

I lucked out and found picked up a case - as a loyal Dew-fanatic I had to try it. It was heavenly. Thanks, Lisa, for the heads up on this wonderful beverage. Guess I better stock up...

By Lisa Shock on Saturday, May 2, 2009 - 01:18 pm:

Yeah, there's a chance they'll make it permanent next year, maybe. Even if they do, that's at least 7 months away.

You can follow their marketing people at Twitter.

By fiffa46 on Thursday, May 7, 2009 - 01:25 pm:

I would much rather see them bring back the only pepsi product I really liked. Dry Grape Ginger ale. That was the BEST!!!!!!!!!

By Lisa Shock on Tuesday, May 19, 2009 - 07:14 pm:

Stores are running low, stock up now! I was lucky enough to find a supermarket with some left having a 5 12-packs for $11 sale!

It's weird, stores in the same chain have different prices all over the valley, where I live.

By WWDMMax on Wednesday, May 20, 2009 - 08:57 pm:

I live on the eastern American coast and finding it varies. Some stores have it en mass and in others you're fortunate to see a price tag for it. Unfortunately, I've gone through my supply already! I should get more soon... wish me luck!

By fiffa46 on Wednesday, May 20, 2009 - 10:30 pm:

My wife just picked some up. I still don't like pepsi but she likes the old style. The rep was putting in on the shelves when she was there and he claimed that the pepsi corp. is almost out of their supply of it.

By Lisa Shock on Thursday, May 21, 2009 - 08:15 am:

Yeah, I've been stocking up. I think I have myself a year's supply of the Pepsi.

But, for me the Dew was more important. (and, I only have an 8 month supply of that) They currently have a product called Pepsi Natural, which I have not found but supposedly will be around for a while, that is also made with sugar and comes in glass bottles. There is no other Dew with sugar planned until next year.

BTW, I like mixing the Dew with Torani syrups to make flavored drinks. There's a lot you can do with blending Dew like an amped up Italian soda.

Anyway, get it while you can. The price variance thing was really weird for me.
